data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - MT Tiny Tales Battlers - Monstrous Uprising
data.detailed_description:
Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT Battlers - Monstrous Uprising, you will find 18 unique and expertly crafted pixel monsters for your game!

Orcs, kobolds, and nagas, creatures from the wild beast tribes are sure to pose an intermediate challenge to any adventuring party!

Features:

- 18 unique static battler sprites split by Orcs, Kobolds and Nagas!
- Pallet Swaps for increased bestiary value, which increases total monster count to 86!
- Charsets of the monsters are bundled, with walking animations for map view!
- Various convenient resizes (2x and 3x) to fit with different resolutions!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
